descriptionHtml:
-------------------What does it do?--------------------------
Basically... retexture of the wolves of skyrim. Only, more realistic. Not this \'Blue Wolf\' Crap..xD [The vanilla looked blue to me].


--------------------What are these \'Packs?\'----------------------------
Each pack has 2 different wolf textures in them. For example, the mexican pack has the mexican wolves, the White & DARK timber/black has those two, and the Timber/Black has those two.
:3


----------------------What are the different \'Versions\' of the packs?--------------------
Different versions have different variations of the type of wolves in the earlier/later versions. For example, In Ver. 2 Of The mexican wolves, they are still mexican wolves, just different patterns/styles. To add more variety. ;3


------------------------Plans for the Future------------------
+I might one day edit the wolf stats?
+And; Add more variations. ie packs.
+I AM PLANNING ON DOING A DOG RETEXTURE PROJECT IN ANOTHER MOD. KEEP AN EYE OUT. ;3


-------------------------Updates--------------------
+Ver. 1 of Mexican wolves released.
+Ver. 1 of White & Dark Timber wolf_black Released.
+Ver. 1 of Timber and Black wolf Released.
author: Kittyeh
